titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C07g

body.ab: <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__8"/> In this account of my early <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__9"/> youth I wish particularly to men<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__10"/>tion<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__left_margin__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0013__Pt1__left_margin__d2e831"/>record <del eID="c56-0013__Pt1__left_margin__d2e831"/> those circumstances which <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__11"/> led to and nourished my taste <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__12"/> for that science which was <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__13"/> the principal amusement of my <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__14"/> boyish days and in the enddeci<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__15"/>ded my destiny. I mentioned before <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__16"/> my taste for old books of chemist<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__17"/>ry and natural magic and I remem<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__18"/>ber very well that I learned latin <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__19"/> principally that I might read <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__20"/> Pliny's Natural History my father <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__21"/> refusing to allow me to read a <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__22"/> translation. I used when very young <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__23"/> to attend lectures of chemistry <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__24"/> given in Geneva and athough <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__25"/> I did not understand them the <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__26"/> experiments never failed to <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__27"/> attract my attention.<del next="#c56-0013.06" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0013__Pt1__main__d2e899"/>I reme<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>mber<del eID="c56-0013__Pt1__main__d2e899"/><lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__28"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0013__Pt1__main__d2e917" xml:id="c56-0013.06"/>also<del eID="c56-0013__Pt1__main__d2e917"/><gap quantity="22" reason="resequencing" unit="tokens"/><gap quantity="4" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0005.06" unit="tei:head"/>Chapt. 2<lb n="c56-0005__main__2"/> Those events which materially influence our fu<lb n="c56-0005__main__3"/>ture destinies <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e949"/>are<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e949"/> often <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e954"/>caused<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e954"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e957"/>by slight or<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e957"/>derive thier origin from atri<lb n="c56-0005__main__4"/>vial occurence<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e971"/>s<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e971"/>. <del next="#c56-0005.02" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e974"/>Strange as the<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e974"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e985"/>statement of the<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e985"/><del next="#c56-0005.03" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e992" xml:id="c56-0005.02"/>simple fact<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e992"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__5"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e998" xml:id="c56-0005.03"/>may appear my fate had been<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e998"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1001"/>Chemist<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1001"/>Natu<lb n="c56-0005__main__6"/>ral philosophy <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1013"/>has<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1013"/> is the genius that has <lb n="c56-0005__main__7"/> regulated my fate I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1020"/>wish<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1020"/>desire the<mdel>ir</mdel>refore in this account <lb n="c56-0005__main__8"/> of my early years to state those facts which <lb n="c56-0005__main__9"/> led to my<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1040"/>love<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1040"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1043"/>pursuit<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1043"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1046"/>first aqu<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1046"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1055"/>of that study.<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1055"/>predeliction for that science. When <lb n="c56-0005__main__10"/> I was eleven years old we all went on a party <lb n="c56-0005__main__11"/> of pleasure to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1068"/>Thonon<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1068"/>Thonon.<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1082"/>and were confined there<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1082"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__12"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1087"/>b<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1087"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1090"/>obil<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1090"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1093"/>obliged by the rain<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1093"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1096"/>and<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1096"/><mdel>t</mdel>The inclemen<lb n="c56-0005__main__13"/>cy of the weather obliged us to remain a day <lb n="c56-0005__main__14"/> confined to the inn. In this house I chanced <lb n="c56-0005__main__15"/> to fin<mdel>ed</mdel>d a <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1123"/>fo<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1123"/> volume<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1126"/>s<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1126"/> of the Works of Corne<lb n="c56-0005__main__16"/>lius Agrippa. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1136"/>And<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1136"/> I opened it with apathy <lb n="c56-0005__main__17"/><del next="#c56-0005.04" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1143"/>but<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1143"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the theory that he attempted to ddemonstrate and the wonderful facts thathe relates <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1160"/>chan<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1160"/> soon changed this feeling into<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1164" xml:id="c56-0005.04"/>continued to re with<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1164"/> enthusiasm. A new <lb n="c56-0005__main__18"/> light dawned upon my mind and <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1173"/>I<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1173"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1176"/>com<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1176"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__19"/> bounding with joy I communicated my <lb n="c56-0005__main__20"/> discovery to my father. I cannot help here remark<lb n="c56-0005__main__21"/>ing the many opportunities <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1192"/>parents<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1192"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>instructors<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1208"/>have<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1208"/>posess<lb n="c56-0005__main__22"/> of directing the attention of their pupils to <lb n="c56-0005__main__23"/> useful knowledge, which they utterly neglect. <lb n="c56-0005__main__24"/> My father looked carelessly at the tit<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1221"/>t<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1221"/>le page <lb n="c56-0005__main__25"/> of my book — <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1227"/>Ah<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1227"/> and said Ah! Cornelius <lb n="c56-0005__main__26"/> Agrippa! — My dear Victor do not waste <lb n="c56-0005__main__27"/> your time upon this – it is sad trash. <lb n="c56-0005__main__28"/> If instead of this remark or rather excla<lb n="c56-0005__main__29"/>mation my father had taken the pains to <lb n="c56-0005__main__30"/>exp<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0005__main__d2e1249"/>ound<del eID="c56-0005__main__d2e1249"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>lain to me that the principles of<lb n="c56-0006__main__1"/> Agrippa had been entirely exploded. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1275"/>And<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1275"/><lb n="c56-0006__main__2"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1280"/>aan<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1280"/> and that <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1285"/>another<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1285"/>a modernsystem of science <lb n="c56-0006__main__3"/> had been introduced which possessed much <lb n="c56-0006__main__4"/> greater power than the ancient because <lb n="c56-0006__main__5"/> the powers of the ancient were pretended <lb n="c56-0006__main__6"/> and chimerical, while those of the moderns <lb n="c56-0006__main__7"/> are real and practical; under such <lb n="c56-0006__main__8"/> circumstances I should certainly have thrown <lb n="c56-0006__main__9"/> Agrippa aside, and with my imagination <lb n="c56-0006__main__10"/> warmed as it was<mdel>w</mdel>should probably have <lb n="c56-0006__main__11"/> aplied myself to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1318"/>m<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1318"/> the more <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1321"/>ra<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1321"/> rational <lb n="c56-0006__main__12"/> theory of chemistry which <del next="#c56-0006.01" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1327"/>has at present<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1327"/>has resulted from modern discoveries<lb n="c56-0006__main__13"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1335" xml:id="c56-0006.01"/>the approbation of the learned.<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1335"/>It is even possible that the train of my ideas might never have recievedthat fatal impulse which led me to my ruin. But the <lb n="c56-0006__main__14"/> cursory glance my father had taken of <lb n="c56-0006__main__15"/> my volume by no means assured me <lb n="c56-0006__main__16"/> that he was acquainted with <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1355"/>the<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1355"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>its contents; <lb n="c56-0006__main__17"/> and I continued to read with the greatest <lb n="c56-0006__main__18"/> avidity. <milestone unit="tei:p"/><metamark function="paragraph">[</metamark>When I returned home, my first <lb n="c56-0006__main__19"/> care was to procure <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1382"/>this<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1382"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>whole works of this <lb n="c56-0006__main__20"/> author and afterwards those of Paracel<lb n="c56-0006__main__21"/>sus and Albertus Magnus. I read and studied<lb n="c56-0006__main__22"/> the wild fancies of these authors with <lb n="c56-0006__main__23"/> delight, they appeared to me treasures <lb n="c56-0006__main__24"/> known to few besides myself; and, although<lb n="c56-0006__main__25"/> I often wished to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1437"/>discover<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1437"/>communicate these secret stores <lb n="c56-0006__main__26"/> of knowledge <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0006__main__d2e1446"/>from<del eID="c56-0006__main__d2e1446"/> to my father yet his in<lb n="c56-0007__main__1"/>definite censure of my favorite Agrippa, <lb n="c56-0007__main__2"/> always withheld me. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1465"/>I let<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1465"/> I disclosed my secret <lb n="c56-0007__main__3"/> to Elizabeth therefore, under a strict promise <lb n="c56-0007__main__4"/> of secrecy; but she did not interest herself <lb n="c56-0007__main__5"/> in <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1477"/>them<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1477"/><mdel/>the subject, and I was left by her to pursue <lb n="c56-0007__main__6"/> my studies alone. –<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0007__main__7"/> It may appear very strange that a desci<lb n="c56-0007__main__8"/>ple of Albertus Magnus should arise in the <lb n="c56-0007__main__9"/> eighteenth century, but our family was not <lb n="c56-0007__main__10"/> scientifical, and I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1512"/>did<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1512"/>had not attended any of the <lb n="c56-0007__main__11"/> lectures given at Geneva. My dreams were <lb n="c56-0007__main__12"/> therefore undisturbed by reality, and I entered <lb n="c56-0007__main__13"/> with the greates diligence into the search <lb n="c56-0007__main__14"/> of the philosophers stone and the <note/>or if you chose petrum philosophale<del next="#c56-0007.02" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1538"/>elizer vi<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1538"/>elixer of life<lb n="c56-0007__main__15"/><del rend=" strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1546" xml:id="c56-0007.02"/>tæ<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1546"/>. But the latter obtained my most undi<lb n="c56-0007__main__16"/>ved attention; wealth was an inferior <lb n="c56-0007__main__17"/> object but what would be the glory <lb n="c56-0007__main__18"/> of the discovery if I could <del rend=" strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1562"/>besto<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1562"/><del rend=" strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1565"/>forever<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1565"/><lb n="c56-0007__main__19"/> banish disease from the human frame <lb n="c56-0007__main__20"/> and render man <del rend=" strikethrough" sID="c56-0007__main__d2e1575"/>unatainable<del eID="c56-0007__main__d2e1575"/><mdel>by</mdel>invunerable to any<lb n="c56-0008__main__1"/><mdel/>but a violent death.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0008__main__2"/> Nor were these my only visions, the <lb n="c56-0008__main__3"/> raising of ghosts or devils <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del next="#c56-0008.02" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1624"/>was also a favour<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1624"/>was a promise liberally accorded by<lb n="c56-0008__main__4"/><del next="#c56-0008.03" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1632" xml:id="c56-0008.02"/>ite<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1632"/><del next="#c56-0008.04" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1635" xml:id="c56-0008.03"/>pursuit<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1635"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1639"/>and<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1639"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1642" xml:id="c56-0008.04"/>If I never saw any<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1642"/>my favourite authors; the fulfilment of which I most eagerly sought;<lb n="c56-0008__main__5"/>& if my incantations were always unsuccessfulattributed <mdel>it</mdel>the failure rather to my own inexperience <lb n="c56-0008__main__6"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1667"/>th<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1667"/> and mistake, than <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to a want of skill <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>or fidelity in <lb n="c56-0008__main__7"/> my instructors.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0008__main__8"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1704"/>When I was about fifteen my f<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1704"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0008__main__9"/> The natural phænonema that takes <lb n="c56-0008__main__10"/> place every day before our eyes did not <lb n="c56-0008__main__11"/> escape my exa<mdel>n</mdel>mi<mdel>m</mdel>nations. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1731"/>I remember<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1731"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1734"/>The<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1734"/><lb n="c56-0008__main__12"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1740"/>fermentation<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1740"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1743"/>of liquors<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1743"/> – <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1746"/>di<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1746"/><shi rend="underline">stillation</shi> of which <lb n="c56-0008__main__13"/> my favorite authors were utterly<note/> ignorant <lb n="c56-0008__main__14"/> excited my astonishment, but my utmost <lb n="c56-0008__main__15"/> wonder was <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1770"/>caused<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1770"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1773"/>by an<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1773"/>engaged by some experiements<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1782"/>air pump<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1782"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1785"/>electrical machine<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1785"/>on an air pump<lb n="c56-0008__main__16"/> which I saw employed<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0008__main__d2e1803"/>used<del eID="c56-0008__main__d2e1803"/> by a gentleman whom <lb n="c56-0008__main__17"/> we were in the habit of visiting.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0008__main__18"/> The ignorance of my philosopher<mdel>es</mdel>s on these <lb n="c56-0008__main__19"/> and several other points, served to decrease<lb n="c56-0009__Pt1__main__1"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>thier credit with <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me – but I could not entirely throw <lb n="c56-0009__Pt1__main__2"/> them aside before <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt1__main__d2e1862"/>any<del eID="c56-0009__Pt1__main__d2e1862"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt1__main__d2e1867"/>some<del eID="c56-0009__Pt1__main__d2e1867"/> some other system <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0009__Pt1__main__d2e1878"/>cocc<del eID="c56-0009__Pt1__main__d2e1878"/>should<lb n="c56-0009__Pt1__main__3"/>occup<mdel>ie</mdel>yd their place<mdel>.</mdel>, in my mind–<gap quantity="25" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><gap quantity="28" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><lb n="c56-0013__Pt2__main__29"/><gap quantity="1" reason="resequencing" unit="tokens"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><metamark function="paragraph"> [</metamark><mdel>w</mdel>When I was about <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0013__Pt2__main__d2e1945"/>twelve<del eID="c56-0013__Pt2__main__d2e1945"/>fourteen years <lb n="c56-0013__Pt2__main__30"/> old we were at our house near <lb n="c56-0013__Pt2__main__31"/> Belrive when we witnessed <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0013__Pt2__main__d2e1956"/>the<del eID="c56-0013__Pt2__main__d2e1956"/> a <lb n="c56-0013__Pt2__main__32"/> violent <mdel>at</mdel>and terrible thunder storm<lb n="c56-0014__main__1"/> it advanced from behind Jura and <lb n="c56-0014__main__2"/> the and the thunder was heard at <lb n="c56-0014__main__3"/> once from<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e1994"/>the d<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e1994"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2002"/>several quarte<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2002"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2005"/>rs<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2005"/><lb n="c56-0014__main__4"/> of the heavens and burst at once with <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2016"/>and<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2016"/><lb n="c56-0014__main__5"/> frightful loudness.<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>from various quarters of the heavens I witnessed th<mdel>is</mdel>e<lb n="c56-0014__main__6"/> elemental<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2049"/>storm with pleasure<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2049"/><lb n="c56-0014__main__7"/> and remained while <mdel>it</mdel>the storm lasted <del next="#c56-0014.06" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2067"/>at<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2067"/>watching its<lb n="c56-0014__left_margin__1"/> its progress <lb n="c56-0014__left_margin__2"/> with curiosity <lb n="c56-0014__left_margin__3"/>& delight<lb n="c56-0014__main__8"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2091" xml:id="c56-0014.06"/>the door<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2091"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2094"/>watchin<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2094"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2097"/>g<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2097"/>. <del next="#c56-0014.10" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2102"/>When it was most<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2102"/>As I stood at the door<lb n="c56-0014__main__9"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2111" xml:id="c56-0014.10"/>violent<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2111"/>,on a sudden I beheld <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2121"/>the<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2121"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a stream of It was not splin<lb n="c56-0014__main__20"/>tered by the shock, but entirely <lb n="c56-0014__main__21"/> reduced to thin ribands of wood. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2243"/>The<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2243"/><lb n="c56-0014__main__22"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0014__main__d2e2248"/>C<del eID="c56-0014__main__d2e2248"/> I never saw any thing so utterly <lb n="c56-0014__main__23"/> destroyed.
